translations: n．强盗，土匪：指在乡村或山区进行抢劫、掠夺的武装匪徒。
· The villagers were terrorized by the brigands who roamed the countryside.
村民们被在乡村游荡的强盗吓坏了。

sentences.sentence: Truly well-governed countries produce few brigands.
sentences.translation: 所以在秩序良好的国家盗匪很少。

sentences.sentence: This episode reflects the history of the two brigands .
sentences.translation: 这就是这两个强盗的历史。

sentences.sentence: He is the son of one of those brigands of the Loire, but children are innocent of their fathers' crimes.
sentences.translation: 他是卢瓦尔省一个强盗的孩子。对父辈的罪行孩子是无罪的。
